projectName: ECD Auto Design - Resume with JS Rendering
preRequisites: Site migrated from static URLs to JavaScript blob: URLs
Current showcase shows 23 projects using blob: navigation

userStories.title: Navigate showcase with browser automation
acceptanceCriteria: Use stealth_scraper.py or claude-in-chrome to navigate showcase
Click into each of 23 project cards
Extract project content from rendered DOM
userStories.notes: blob: URLs require JS execution, cannot be accessed via HTTP

userStories.title: Scrape all 23 current projects
userStories.notes: Existing Project 13 already scraped, need remaining 22

userStories.title: Extract Defender build specifications
acceptanceCriteria: Parse project pages for vehicle specs
Extract: model (Defender 90/110), engine, color, interior, wheels
ECD specializes in custom Land Rover Defenders
userStories.notes: ECD builds are high-end Defender restorations with LS/Coyote swaps

userStories.title: Extract modifications from builds
acceptanceCriteria: Parse modification lists (engines, wheels, interior, exterior)
userStories.notes: Common ECD mods: LS V8, Coyote V8, custom wheels, leather interior, roof racks

userStories.title: Complete and verify pipeline
userStories.notes: This is a data enrichment run, not initial scrape
